# 2025 Queensland International III

Alex Bolt
| champmd= Matt Hulme /  Kody Pearson
| champws= Katie Swan
| champwd= Destanee Aiava /  Maddison Inglis
| before_year=2025
| before_name=Queensland International II
| main_name=Queensland International
| after_name=Queensland International
}}
The 2025 Queensland International III was a professional tennis tournament played on hardcourts. It was the third edition of the tournament which was part of the 2025 ATP Challenger Tour and 2025 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Brisbane, Australia between 10 and 16 November 2025.

Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw:
*  Cruz Hewitt
*  Pavle Marinkov
*  Tai Sach
The following player received entry into the singles main draw through the Junior Accelerator programme:
*  Mees Röttgering
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Blaise Bicknell
*  Emile Hudd
*  Hayato Matsuoka
*  Carl Emil Overbeck
*  Leo Vithoontien
*  Wu Tung-lin
Champions
Men's singles
* Alex Bolt def.  Wu Tung-lin 6–3, 6–3.
Women's singles
* Katie Swan def.  Wei Sijia 3–6, 6–3, 6–3.
Men's doubles
* Matt Hulme /  Kody Pearson def.  Anirudh Chandrasekar /  Reese Stalder 7–6(7–5), 3–6, [10–6].
Women's doubles
* Destanee Aiava /  Maddison Inglis def.  Gabriella Da Silva-Fick /  Tenika McGiffin 7–6(7–3), 7–6(9–7).
